A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A dark and refreshing continuation of the Star Wars saga- offering a plethora of surprises and reveals. This is definitely one of the most cathartic films in the saga with Adam Driver's Kylo Ren being the centre of it. However\, the tonal inconsistencies hold this film back from being a masterpiece; this film still has the makings of a modern classic. Watch it if you haven't already.
